sentences.en: ...devotion to the cause of the people and to socialism.
sentences.cn: …对于人民的事业和社会主义的献身。

sentences.en: As a soldier, he showed selfless devotion to duty.
sentences.cn: 作为战士, 他表现出了对其天职的无私奉献.

sentences.en: At first she was flattered by his devotion.
sentences.cn: 刚开始他的爱慕让她感到荣幸。

sentences.en: Despite his constant protes-tations of devotion and love, her doubts persisted.
sentences.cn: 尽管他一直宣称对她的爱忠贞不渝，她仍然心存怀疑。

sentences.en: He had an unswerving devotion to duty.
sentences.cn: 他坚定不移地忠于职守.

sentences.en: He is adorable for his devotion to science.
sentences.cn: 他献身科学的精神令人敬佩.

sentences.en: He was kneeling by his bed in an attitude of devotion.
Her devotion to the job left her with very little free time.
sentences.cn: 她全身心投入工作，几乎没有闲暇。

sentences.en: His devotion to the cause of education is well - known.
sentences.cn: 他对教育事业的献身精神是众所周知的.

sentences.en: His success showed his magnetism of courage and devotion.
sentences.cn: 他的成功表现了他的胆量和热诚的魅力.

sentences.en: His transference of devotion from Nicola to Susan was complete.
sentences.cn: 他对妮古拉的挚爱完全转移到了苏珊身上。

sentences.en: I don't mean to keep criticising his devotion to his job.
sentences.cn: 我并不是要一再批评他对工作的专注。

sentences.en: Science demands of men effort and complete devotion.
sentences.cn: 要掌握科学必须努力并对其高度热爱.

sentences.en: The general had an unswerving devotion to duty.
sentences.cn: 这位将军坚定不移地忠于职守.

sentences.en: The judge praised the firefighters for their bravery and devotion to duty.
sentences.cn: 法官赞扬消防人员的勇气和敬业精神.

sentences.en: The spirit consists in whole - hearted devotion to public interests.
sentences.cn: 这种精神就是一心为公.

sentences.en: Total devotion it certainly was, slavish devotion some would say.
sentences.cn: 这当然是绝对的忠诚，有人也许会称之为俯首帖耳，唯命是从。
